column1: Right score - draw: 3 points (e.g. you pick for Team 1 : Team 2 1:1, the actual score is 1:1)
Right score - one team winning: 3 points (e.g. you pick for Team 1 : Team 2 3:1, the actual score is 3:1)
Right goal difference - draw: 2 points (e.g. you pick for Team 1 : Team 2 1:1, the actual score is 0:0)
Right goal difference - one team winning: 2 points (e.g. you pick for Team 1 : Team 2 3:1, the actual score is 2:0)
Right outcome: 1 point (e.g. you pick for Team 1 : Team 2 3:1, the actual score is 1:0)
